ingredients: 3 tablespoons butter, 2 tablespoons minced shallots, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1 teaspoon dried tarragon,   +   1/4 teaspoon salt,   +   1/4 teaspoon white pepper,   +   1/4 cup white wine, 1  lemon, juiced, 1 tablespoon fresh parsley
